Entry.JapaneseText: お船？ 私も乗りたい！
Entry.EnglishText: You're going on a ship? I wanna ride too!

Entry.JapaneseText: 逃げてた女の人？ 私、見たよ！ 南の入口の前を通り過ぎてったよ。
Entry.EnglishText: A girl running away? I saw one! She headed straight towards the south entrance.

Entry.JapaneseText: お家の中から見たの。 街の外には出てってないと思うよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I saw her go inside the house, I don't think she went out of town.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様のオヒロメのギシキ？ 私も見たい！
Entry.EnglishText: The Queen's In Awgyu Rayshun Ceremony? I wanna go and watch!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマ!? 私、キラーイ！
なんでガジュマがキライか？ 私、そんなのわかんなーい！
Entry.EnglishText: Why do I hate Gajumas? I don't know!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……でも、羽が生えてたり 角が生えてたりして、私と 違うからかも……
Entry.EnglishText: But I think it's because we're different... because they have feathers and horns and stuff...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマ!? 私、前よりもっとキラーイ！
Entry.EnglishText: I hate Gajumas even more than before!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとガジュマは 仲良くしちゃダメなんだから！
Entry.EnglishText: After all, it's impossible for Humas and Gajumas to get along!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマがキライかって？ 私、とってもキラーイ！
Entry.EnglishText: Do you think I don't like Gajumas? Well I really really hate them!

Entry.JapaneseText: だって、お母さんが ガジュマはイジワルで イヤな<Yellow>ヒト<White>たちだって……
Entry.EnglishText: Because my mommy told me that Gajumas are really mean <Yellow>people<White> who tease others...

Entry.JapaneseText: なぁに、この音!? 私、こわいよー！
見て見て！ お魚さんが泳いでるの。 かーわいいー!!
Entry.EnglishText: Come and look! The little cute fishies are swimming!

Entry.JapaneseText: お船？ 私たちも乗せてくれるの？
Entry.EnglishText: A ship? Can I come with you too?

Entry.JapaneseText: さっきのおねえちゃんたちが 話してたおばちゃん、 様子が変だったよね？
Entry.EnglishText: The old lady that the girls were talking to earlier was pretty strange, isn't she?

Entry.JapaneseText: さっきのおにいちゃんたちが 話してたおばちゃん、 様子が変だったよね？
Entry.EnglishText: The old lady that the guys were talking to earlier was pretty strange, isn't she?

Entry.JapaneseText: かくれんぼの 一番いい隠れ場所って 家の中か……水の中よね♪
Entry.EnglishText: The best places to hide in when playing hide-and-seek is probably inside a house... or under the water!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、女王様を見てみたいなぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: I wanna go see the Queen...

Entry.JapaneseText: だって、お母さんたちが、 王様がガジュマだって事を ホコリに思いなさいって！
Entry.EnglishText: Because my mom told me to boast about our King being a Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマはヒューマと 仲良くしちゃイケナイんだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: It's impossible for Humas and Gajumas to get along together!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私だって、最近は ヒューマと遊んでないもん！
Entry.EnglishText: Even I haven't played with Humas lately!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとは お話しないって決めたの！
Entry.EnglishText: I decided that I'm never ever gonna talk to Humas!

Entry.JapaneseText: だって、ヒューマは ガジュマの敵だって みんなが言ってるもん！
Entry.EnglishText: Because everyone says that Humas are Gajumas' enemies!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、ホントは……ヒューマの おともだちと遊びたいの。
Entry.EnglishText: To be honest... I really want to play with my Huma friends.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、ケンカしちゃったし、 お母さんたちも会っちゃダメって しかられるから……
Entry.EnglishText: But they only fight and my mom doesn't really want me to be with them...

Entry.JapaneseText: お魚がどっかに 行っちゃったよ！
Entry.EnglishText: There's some fishes coming from somewhere!

Entry.JapaneseText: この音のせいで、 逃げちゃったのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if they're running away because of this sound?

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、お母さんたちに 叱られてもいいから、 ヒューマのおともだちと 遊びたいの……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't care if my mom gets angry at me, I wanna go play with my Huma friends!

Entry.JapaneseText: だって、みんな仲良しのほうが 楽しいんだもん……
Entry.EnglishText: Because it's more fun when everyone gets along...

Entry.JapaneseText: お魚さんはね、泳いでるところを 躍り食いするのが一番なの。
Entry.EnglishText: Fish are best eaten while they're still swimming!

Entry.JapaneseText: この音…… 津波でも来るんじゃ……!?
Entry.EnglishText: This sound... Is there a tidal wave coming...!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 津波なんて来たら、この街は 一発で沈んじまうよ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: This city will be gone in a blink of an eye if it does come!!

Entry.JapaneseText: まったく…… 女の買い物は 長くていけねえや……
Entry.EnglishText: Sheesh, women do like taking their time shopping, don't they?

Entry.JapaneseText: ん？ ヒューマは外出禁止だろ？
Entry.EnglishText: Hm? Aren't you Humas supposed to be indoors?

Entry.JapaneseText: こんな地鳴りぐらいで 騒ぎ立ててもらっては困る。 静かに家にいろ。
Entry.EnglishText: There's no need to make a fuss out of a small earthquake like this. Just be quiet and stay home.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたの連れのヒューマを 屋内に入れろ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Send the Humas with you back indoors!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは 屋内に入っていろ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Humas are supposed to stay indoors!!

Entry.JapaneseText: 東のほうから なにやら聞こえるね……
Entry.EnglishText: I can hear something coming from the east...

Entry.JapaneseText: 雷雲でも近づいて 来てるのかね……
Entry.EnglishText: Is there gonna be a storm soon?

Entry.JapaneseText: 特別警戒中だ……って、 何だかやり過ぎのような 気もするな……
Entry.EnglishText: This "special surveilance" thingy feels kind of... excessive...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1600001c>皆さんは、ヒューマの女の子を 探していらっしゃるんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1600001C>Is it true that you're searching for Huma girls?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1600001e>皆さんが、港で軍の方と 話しているのが聞こえたんです。 もしかしてその子というのは、 さらわれたのでは……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1600001E>I overheard you talking to the soldier at the harbor. By any chance, were those girls kidnapped...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1600001f>おばさん、 何か知ってるのかい？
<voice:16000020>実は…… 私も娘を、サレとトーマという 二人組にさらわれたのです。 ちょうど昨日の事でした……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:16000020>Well... Just yesterday, my own daughter was taken by two people called Saleh and Tohma...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:16000021>そいつらはどこへ？ 船か？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:16000021>Where were they headed? Did they get on a boat?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:16000022>いいえ、私の娘や 他の娘さんたちを連れて、 西へ向かいました。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:16000022>No, they took my daughter and the other Huma girls and went westward.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:16000023>西？ という事は、 テルアラ街道の方か。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:16000023>West? That must mean they're taking the Tel'Alla Highroad.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:16000024>昨日か……急げば、 追いつけるかもしれないな。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:16000024>Yesterday, huh... If we hurry, we might catch up to them!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:16000025>もしその娘さんを助けに行かれるなら、 皆さんの力で、娘も……<Hilda>も 一緒に救い出してくださいませんか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:16000025>If you're going to rescue the girls, could you please save my dear <Hilda>?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:16000027>ええ。お願いです!! どうか、娘を……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:16000027>Yes. I beg of you! Please, save my daughter...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:16000028>ああ、絶対に連れ戻してみせる！ おばさんは、ここで待っててくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:16000028>Don't worry, ma'am! We'll get her back, just wait here.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1800005e>それでは発表する。 来たる<Blue>ゴルドバの日<White>に、 女王陛下のお披露目の式が 執り行われる運びとなった。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1800005E>Attention, I have an announcement to make. On the next <BLue>Day of Goldova<White>, Her Majesty the Queen's inauguration ceremony will commence.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1800005f>お披露目の式、だって。 どうして<Blue>ゴルドバの日<White>なのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1800005F>An inauguration ceremony, eh? Why on the <Blue>Day of Goldova<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000060><Blue>ゴルドバの日<White>は 古代の勇者ゴルドバが、人々と共に カレギア王国を興し、その初代国王に 即位した日を記念した祝日だ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000060>The <Blue>Day of Goldova<White> celebrates when the ancient hero, Goldova, established the Kingdom of Callegea alongside his people and ascended to the throne as its first king.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000061>それになぞらえて お披露目の式をやろうという 陛下のお考えなのだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000061>The Queen probably intends to pattern her inauguration ceremony after the one held by her ancestor so long ago.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000062>ラドラス王崩御後、大事があり、 女王陛下におかれては略式の戴冠式のみで 済まされていたが、ようやく国が落ち着き、 このたびのお披露目と相成った。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000062>Because of the pressing matters following King Ladras's passing, only a modest coronation for our Queen was held. Since things have calmed down, there will now be a proper inauguration ceremony.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000063>それに伴う警備の一環として、 お披露目の式が終了するまで、 バビログラードを除くすべての港を封鎖し、 首都バルカとの往来を禁止している。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000063>As a measure of security, until the ceremony has come to a close, travel to Balka from all ports except for Babilograd's will be strictly prohibited.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000064>港が封鎖されていたのは、 そういう事だったのか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000064>So that's why the ports have been closed off?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000065>いや…… 警備のためだけにしては、 物々しい雰囲気を感じたが……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000065>No... It seems much too restrictive to be a mere security measure.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000066><Blue>王の盾<White>の動きと 関係が……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000066>Do you think the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>'s actions have something to do with it?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000068>……女の子を集めてるコトと、 <Blue>ゴルドバの日<White>のお披露目の儀式に 何か関係があるのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000068>Maybe kidnapping the girls and the inauguration ceremony on the <Blue>Day of Goldova<White> are somehow connected?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000069>儀式のために 女の子を集めてるって事？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000069>So they're kidnapping the girls for the ceremony?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1800006a>何だかわからないけど、 イヤな予感がするぜ……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1800006A>Something about this gives me a bad feeling...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1800006b><Blue>ゴルドバの日<White>まで もう、そんなに時間がない……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1800006B>There isn't much time until the <Blue>Day of Goldova<White> either...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1800006c>スージーの話が真実なら、 さらわれたヒューマの娘たちは、 最終的にはカレギア城へ連れて いかれるはずだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1800006C>If Susie's story is true, then the final destination of all the kidnapped girls ought to be Callegea Castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1800006d>じゃあ、姉貴も クレアさんも……
<voice:1800006e>バルカへ急ごう。 バビログラードからなら 船が出ているという話だったな。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1800006E>We need to get to Balka. From what he said, we should be able to take a boat from Babilograd.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1800006f>ああ…… だが、楽な道程じゃないぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1800006F>Right... However, it won't be a walk in the park.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000070>ここから バビログラードへ行くには、 クロダダク砂漠を 越えなくてはいけない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000070>In order to get to Babilograd from here, we need to cross the Kurodadaku Desert first.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:18000071>うん、砂漠は水もないし、暑いから それなりの覚悟は必要だネ！ 準備がすんだら出発しよう！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:18000071>Yep. There's barely any water there and it's really hot, so be prepared for that! We can leave once everyone's ready!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000003>よくぞ、ここまでたどり着いた。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000003>You have done well to come this far.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:36000004>あんたが聖獣ランドグリーズなのか？ ここは<Blue>幻の島<White>なのかよ!?
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:36000004>Are you the Sacred Beast Randgriz? Then is this really the <Blue>Island of Illusions<White>?!
<voice:36000006>So just before us lies the <Yellow>Sacred Beast<White>...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000020>静かだな…… これが平和ってヤツか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000020>It's quiet... So I guess this is what peace is like?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000021>元のカレギアに 戻ったのよね……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000021>Callegea has gone back to the way it was, right...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000022>おそらく…… いや、そうであって 欲しいものだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000022>Most likely it has... Or perhaps we just want that to be the case.
<voice:37000023>The only thing that hasn't returned to normal is...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000027>ん？ どうした<Mao>？ なんか元気ねえな？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000027>Huh? What's the matter, <Mao>? What's got you down?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000028>……ずっと言おうと思ってて 言い出せなかったんだけど…… 実はボク……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000028>There's something that I've been wanting to tell you guys for a while now, but I just haven't been able to get the words out. The truth is, I...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700002a>ヒューマでもガジュマでも…… ハーフでもなくって……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700002A>I'm not a Huma, or a Gajuma, or even a Half...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700002b>聖獣たちが<Yellow>ヒト<White>の姿に似せて、 ボクを作り出したんだって。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700002B>I'm a creation of the Sacred Beasts, made in the image of <Yellow>Man<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700002c><Yellow>ヒト<White>じゃ…… ないんだってさ……
<voice:3700002e>……ボクは聖獣たちに <Yellow>ヒト<White>を監視する<Red>目<White>として、 この世界に送り込まれた。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700002E>They sent me out into the world of <Yellow>Man<White> so that I could be their <Red>eyes<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:3700002f>だから、記憶喪失じゃなくて、 最初から記憶が無かった。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:3700002F>So I didn't really lose my memories, since I never had any to begin with.
<voice:37000030>And you're not one of the Sacred Beasts?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000031>うん、ボクは自分で考えて、 自分で行動してる。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000031>Nope, I think on my own and act on my own.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000032>聖獣たちから命令されてる ワケでもないよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000032>And I don't recieve orders from the Sacred Beasts either.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000033>だから…… みんなに聞きたいんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000033>So, I want to ask you guys something.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000034>こんなボクだけど、 これからも一緒に行って いいのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000034>Are you guys okay with me still travelling alongside you?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:37000036>聖獣に作られようと…… どんな姿をしていようと…… おまえは、おまえだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:37000036>...No matter if you were made by the Sacred Beasts, and no matter what you appear to be... You are you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>ランドグリーズのところへ 移動しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: Teleport to Randgriz's Shrine? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
